option.name: casesFile
option.description: Path to a pedigree )containing the names of the CASES.

option.name: controlsFile
option.description: Path to a pedigree containing the names of the CONTROLS.

option.name: maxMAF
option.description: if MAF of cases OR MAF of control is greater than maxMAF, the the FILTER Column is Filled

option.name: minFisherPValue
option.description: if p-value fisher(case/control vs have alt/have not alt) lower than 'fisher' the the FILTER Column is Filled

app.documentation:
Variant in that VCF should have one and only one ALT allele. Use https://github.com/lindenb/jvarkit/wiki/VcfMultiToOneAllele if needed.
Output
INFO column
BurdenF2MAFCas : MAF cases
BurdenF2MAFControls : MAF controls
BurdenF1Fisher : Fisher test
FILTER column
BurdenF2MAFCas : MAF for cases doesn't meet user's requirements
BurdenF2MAFControls : MAF for controls doesn't meet user's requirements
BurdenF2MAFCaseOrControls : MAF for controls or cases doesn't meet user's requirements
BurdenF1Fisher :Fisher test doesn't meet user's requirements
see also
VcfBurdenFilter3
